songs.title: We Are Young (Acoustic Cover)
songs.lyrics:
[Chorus: Jesy & All & (Jade) & {Perrie}]
Tonight
We are young
(So let's set the world on) Fire
{We can burn} Brighter than the sun

[Verse 1: Perrie & (Leigh-Anne)]
Give me a second, I, I need to get my story straight
My friends are in the bathroom getting higher than the Empire State
My lover, he's waiting for me just across the bar
My seat's been taken by some sunglasses asking about a scar, and
(I know I gave it to you months ago
I know you're trying to forget
But between the drinks and subtle things, the holes in my apologies
I'm trying hard to take it back)

[Pre-Chorus: Jesy]
So if by the time the bar closes
And you feel like falling down, I'll carry you home

[Chorus: All x2]

[Verse 2: Jade & All]
Now I know that I'm not all that you got
I guess that I I just thought Maybe we could find new ways to fall apart
But now our friends are back, so let's raise a cup
Cause I found someone to carry me home

[Chorus: All & (Jade)]
Tonight (Tonight, tonight)
We are young (We are young)
So let's set the world on fire
We can burn brighter than the sun

[Chorus: All]

[Bridge: Jesy & (Leigh-Anne) & {Perrie}]
Nananananana
Nananananana
(Carry me home tonight, carry me home tonight
Carry me home tonight, carry me home tonight)
{The moon is on my side, we have no reason to run
So will someone come and carry me home}

[Chorus: All]

[Chorus: All & (Perrie)]
Tonight (Tonight, tonight)
We are young
So let's set the world on fire
We can burn brighter than the sun

[Outro: Jesy & All]
So if by the time the bar closes
And you feel like falling down, I'll carry you home Tonight
